General.Name: eBay Inc
General.Description: eBay Inc. operates marketplace platforms that connect buyers and sellers in the United States and internationally. The company's marketplace platform includes its online marketplace at ebay.com and the eBay suite of mobile apps. Its platforms enable users to list, buy, and sell various products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 2025 Hamilton Avenue, San Jose, CA, United States, 95125
